Regulation Name(s): Respiratory viral panel multiplex nucleic acid assay
Methodologies: Multiplex nucleic acid amplification and detection
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Focus Diagnostics Simplexa™ Flu A/B & RSV multiplex RT-PCR assay for detection and differentiation of influenza A, influenza B, and RSV from nasopharyngeal swabs.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection and discrimination of influenza A, influenza B, and RSV RNA in nasopharyngeal swabs from symptomatic patients to aid in differential diagnosis of viral respiratory infections; not intended to detect influenza C.
